text: @NYGovCuomo As of 4:00 PM, Friday, in NYC, there were 94,409  cases of COVID-19, 6,684 more than there were Thursday. There were an estimated 25,920 total coronavirus hospitalizations, up by 4,349 from Thurs. The death toll jumped to 5,429, an increase of 651 from Thurs. night. Do your job.
